snippet: Gus Johnson, best known for his calls of college basketball and the N.F.L., said he was stepping down as Fox’s lead soccer announcer.
abstract: Fox's lead soccer broadcaster Gus Johnson announces that he is stepping down; Johnson knew little about soccer when he started calling games, and was frequently panned on social media for botching names and facts; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Gus Johnson, best known for his calls of college basketball and the N.F.L., said he was stepping down as Fox’s lead soccer announcer.

headline.main: Gus Johnson Quits as Top Soccer Announcer for Fox
headline.print_headline: Johnson Quits as Top Announcer for Fox
